text: Neil Adam Carroll (born 21 September 1988) is an English footballer with Caernarfon Town. Carroll joined Chester City as a junior, progressing to a professional contract. He made his solitary Football League appearance for Chester in a 2–1 win at Macclesfield Town on 29 September 2007, starting the game in midfield. He was loaned to Leigh RMI under Steve Bleasdale in 2008 and was released by Chester at the end of the season. He joined Caernarfon Town in July 2008. ==External links== * *Premier League profile ==References== Category:Chester City F.C. players Category:Leigh Genesis F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:English Football League players Category:1988 births Category:Association football midfielders Category:Living people Category:Caernarfon Town F.C. players Category:Cymru Premier players Category:People from Cheltenham
title: Neil Carroll
